params.merkleTreeHeight: height of the merkle tree that stores the asset record commitments
params.nRoots: number of the most recent roots of the records merkle tree to be stored
params.verifierAddr: address of the Plonk Verifier contract

params.erc20Address: address of the ERC20 token corresponding to the deposit.
params.ro: record opening that will be inserted in the records merkle tree once the deposit is validated.

params.faucetManagerAddress: address of public key of faucet manager for CAP native token (testnet only!)
params.faucetManagerEncKey: public key of faucet manager for CAP native token (testnet only!)

returns._0: True if the asset type is registered, false otherwise.

params.newAsset: An asset type to be registered in the contract

params.newBlock: block to be processed by the CAPE contract.

params.extraData: extra data to be stored in calldata, this data is ignored by the contract function.
params.newBlock: block to be processed by the CAPE contract.

depositErc20((uint64,(uint256,((uint256,.notice: allows to wrap some erc20 tokens into some CAPE asset defined in the record opening

faucetSetupForTestnet((uint256,uint256),.notice: Allocate native token faucet to a manager for testnet only

isCapeAssetRegistered((uint256,((uint256.notice: Is the given asset definition registered?

lookup((uint256,((uint256,uint256),(uint.notice: Fetch the ERC-20 token address corresponding to the given asset definition.

sponsorCapeAsset(address,(uint256,((uint.notice: Create and register a new asset type associated with an ERC-20 token. Will revert if the asset type is already registered or the ERC-20 token address is zero.

submitCapeBlock(((uint256,uint256),uint8.notice: Submit a new block to the CAPE contract. Transactions are validated and the blockchain state is updated. Moreover *BURN* transactions trigger the unwrapping of cape asset records into erc20 tokens.

submitCapeBlockWithMemos(((uint256,uint2.notice: Submit a new block with extra data to the CAPE contract.
